import React,{useState} from 'react'; const trains=[ {id:'t1',nom:'Buraq',villes:[]}, {id:'t2',nom:'Gazel', villes:[]}, {id:'t3',nom:'Eagle-Wins', villes:[]}, {id:'t4',nom:'Fennec', villes:[]}, ] export default function App() { const [id,setId]=useState() const [list,setLists]=useState() const [ville,setVille]=useState('') const [message, setMessage]=useState('') function rechercher(){ if(id){ setLists(trains.find((t)=> t.id==id)) } } function ajouter_ville(){ if(list){ list.villes.push(ville) setMessage('Ville ajoutÃ© aux villes de passage') }} return (
